articles.title: Powerball, Mega Millions jackpots among largest in US history - KABC-TV
articles.description: The Mega Millions jackpot has reached $850M as still no winner has been announced; the Powerball drawing is Saturday for $640M.
articles.content:
Two of the largest jackpots in U.S. lottery history are continuing to grow.The Powerball, which is the 8th largest jackpot, is up to $640 million. The odds of winning are one in 292.2 million.
